notes: Can only trigger when an attack lands on an enemy. This means it cannot trigger on missed attacks.
Only triggers against enemy heroes (including illusions and clones, excluding creep-heroes).
Does not trigger if the attacking unit is a clone or illusion.

Applies a hex on the target, setting its base movement speed to 140, silencing, muting and disarming it. However the target's movement speed is still affected by movement speed bonuses from items and abilities.
Since hex changes base movement speed and does not actually apply a slow, all speed effects are calculated using the 140 base speed.
Prince's Knife's hex transforms the target into a frog.
abilities.description: The next attack hexes the hit enemy into a frog for 1.5 seconds.

info: The projectile speed bonus only affects attack projectiles.
